thread.title: Grammy winners Pentatonix finally getting airplay
thread.title_full: Grammy winners Pentatonix finally getting airplay

title: Grammy winners Pentatonix finally getting airplay
text:
> Entertainment Grammy winners Pentatonix finally getting airplay In this Sept. 4, 2015, photo, Kevin Olusola, from left, Kristie Maldonado, Scott Hoying, Mitch Grassi and Avi Kaplan of the group Pentatonix pose for a portrait at Sony Music Nashville in Nashville, Tenn., to promote their latest album, "Pentatonix" (Photo by Donn Jones/Invision/AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
